document_data.name: Tree of Dhaerow
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tree of Dhaerow''' was a dead tree on a hilltop in the [[Yuirwood]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||Prologue}} The word ''dhaerow'' was [[elven language|Elven]] for "traitor", and the etymological precursor to "[[drow]]".
document_data.Description: The tree's leafless trunk was hard and gray. It shuddered with the wind during storms, and had a foul atmosphere around it.
document_data.Activities: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[Masters of the Yuirwood]] hung their vilest criminals on it.  The assassin [[Kheil]] was hung and flayed on the Tree of Dhaerow before being revived, retrained, and renamed by [[Chereth]].
